Our entrepreneurial resilience has been decisive. It enabled us to secure financing at critical stages, convincing public institutions, banks, and strategic partners of the strength and credibility of our vision. Without this resilience, our founder †” Calvine Tong †” would not have been admitted to the highly selective Réseau Entreprendre, funded by BPI, or nominated as a NextGen Health Leader by La French Care. Remarkably, she achieved this without a traditional background in business, management, or entrepreneurship, demonstrating that perseverance and conviction can overcome systemic barriers.

The social impact is tangible and inclusive. PrévenirCare engages certified healthcare professionals and patient communities to deliver accessible, science-based programs. We reduce health inequalities, empower working-age adults often excluded from prevention, and foster healthier workplaces and societies.

By combining resilience, adaptability, and inclusivity, PrévenirCare is uniquely positioned to transform the culture of health. We are building a future where prevention is no longer optional, but a universal norm †” delivering measurable benefits for individuals, businesses, and society.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari:
In India, over â‚¹2.4 lakh crore (~$30B) lies unclaimed across EPF, banks, PPF, insurance, and shares, growing 20% annually. Families wait 8+ months to access rightful funds, while institutions face compliance burdens, fraud risks, and escalating costs.

Kustodian.Life is building the world's first AI-native digital infrastructure to automate wealth recovery. Unlike portals or agents handling fragmented steps, we digitize the entire journey†”combining AI document intelligence, automated compliance, and human empathy.

With $100B+ unclaimed across G20 nations, Kustodian is pioneering digital custodianship, restoring wealth to families and unlocking trapped capital for communities worldwide.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
Kustodian.Life is pioneering Wealth Recovery-as-a-Service (WRaaS), the first AI-native platform dedicated to unlocking unclaimed financial assets. Our digital technology blends AI/ML document intelligence, automated compliance, and human empathy to transform an outdated, paper-heavy process into a seamless digital journey.

Unlike fragmented agents or exploitative middlemen, our success-based business model ensures families only pay after funds are recovered†”building trust and aligning incentives. By cutting claim resolution from 8 months to days, reducing rejection rates by up to 90%, and shrinking customer effort from 100 hours to 1, we make recovery faster, simpler, and scalable for institutions.

We stand apart with domain-specific AI trained on Indian financial documents, a compliance-first infra with audit trails and DPDP-readiness, and a dual value proposition: every claim benefits families while strengthening our AI infrastructure.

Kustodian isn't just solving inefficiency†”it is creating a new global category in digital custodianship
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev:
Kustodian.Life has created 15+ full-time jobs, with >50% women and 70% from Tier-2/3 towns. These are career-path roles in financial recovery, AI operations, and compliance†”not gig work†”backed by training and stability.

By 2027, we aim to scale to 500 new jobs in India, and by 2035, to thousands across G20 nations. Each role uplifts families, builds financial literacy, and establishes a new workforce category: financial custodianship.
data.We operate in the fight against digital:
Every year, hundreds of millions of people struggle to access savings, pensions, or insurance†”often during the hardest moments of life: a loved one's passing, retirement, or medical crisis. Families wait months, facing endless paperwork, delays, and uncertainty.

Kustodian.Life exists to make life simple and money available when it is needed most. By removing middlemen and using an AI-enabled, transparent system, we give families dignity, speed, and certainty. Beyond recovering wealth, we are restoring hope and reducing inequality, one claim at a time.

Every rupee unlocked has a 2†“3x multiplier effect†”flowing into healthcare, education, and small enterprises†”strengthening families, fostering resilience, and empowering communities at scale.

At Kustodian.Life, resilience begins with our people. Our team has navigated complex regulations, incomplete documentation, and distressed families†”adapting quickly to deliver results under pressure. In tough scenarios, we combine AI-driven automation with human problem-solving to cut through red tape and secure funds when families need them most.

By channeling recovered wealth into healthcare, education, and enterprises, we actively support economic recovery while building a future-ready workforce.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
Kustodian.Life deserves recognition as the world's first tech-enabled financial custodianship platform, unlocking over â‚¹2.4 lakh crore ($30B+) of dormant wealth in India and tackling a $100B+ global problem across G20 nations.

Every year, hundreds of millions of families struggle for months†”even years†”to reclaim pensions, PF, and insurance at life's most vulnerable moments. Kustodian transforms this broken process with our Wealth Recovery-as-a-Service (WRaaS) model: AI-driven automation, compliance-first infra, and a success-based fee structure where families only pay after recovery. This alignment of trust and impact sets us apart from agents and middlemen.

Our resilience is proven. Early scaling was difficult†”offline dependencies, paperwork, and mistrust slowed adoption. We adapted by building a 30+ partner network across metros and Tier-1 cities, blending automation with local reliability. This hybrid model turned obstacles into strengths, reduced fraud, and built lasting trust with users and institutions.

The impact is real: we have supported 1,500+ families, recovering an average of â‚¹15 lakh ($18K) each†”funds that directly fuel healthcare, education, and small enterprises. Our workforce reflects inclusivity: 50% women, 70% Tier-2/3 hires. Each rupee recovered creates a 2†“3x multiplier effect in local economies, making Kustodian both socially impactful and economically catalytic.

Aligned with UN SDGs (1, 8, 10), Kustodian is not just unlocking wealth†”it is restoring dignity, creating jobs, and building resilience. With the potential to create 50,000+ jobs globally, we are defining a new category in inclusive fintech.

Recognition today would accelerate our mission: making wealth recovery fast, fair, and accessible when people need it most.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: M2Guide is a career guidance ecosystem designed to help students and young professionals make informed and confident career decisions. Unlike generic tests, we use psychological assignments that encourage self-reflection and reveal true strengths and interests. Based on these insights, users receive a personalized career roadmap with clear steps from education to career goals. The app also offers mentorship from industry experts, timely notifications about scholarships and opportunities, and a student networking feature to connect with peers of similar interests in their city. With empathy, innovation, and technology, M2Guide is shaping a generation with clarity and confidence.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
M2Guide is transforming the way students make career choices by combining psychology, mentorship, and technology. Instead of relying on generic aptitude tests, it uses psychological assignments to help students reflect, identify strengths, and discover true interests. Based on this, the platform provides a personalized career roadmap, guiding learners on what to do and how to do it. Beyond roadmaps, students can access mentorship from real industry experts and a networking feature to connect with peers in their city.

What sets M2Guide apart is its upcoming AR/VR innovation. With Virtual Reality, students will experience an immersive virtual tour of their chosen careers, giving them a realistic preview of different professions. With Augmented Reality, students will be trained through interactive, hands-on learning experiences that make skill-building more engaging and practical.

By blending psychological insights, expert mentorship, networking, and immersive AR/VR technology, M2Guide is creating a future-ready ecosystem that ensures career clarity, confidence, and impact.
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev:
M2Guide is designed not only to guide students but also to create sustainable employment opportunities. As the platform grows, it will generate jobs in multiple sectors. We will employ career counselors, mentors, and subject experts to provide personalized guidance to students. Our technical team of developers, designers, and data analysts will continue expanding to enhance app features and user experience. Additionally, a marketing and outreach team will be engaged to take M2Guide to schools, colleges, and communities across India.

In the long run, M2Guide will also build a network of freelance mentors and trainers, offering them a platform to monetize their expertise while shaping young careers. This model creates direct jobs within the company and indirect income opportunities for professionals across industries. With scale, M2Guide envisions employing hundreds of people, contributing meaningfully to both youth empowerment and job creation in India.
data.We operate in the fight against digital:
M2Guide tackles one of the biggest social challenges faced by today's youth †” career confusion and lack of access to proper guidance. Millions of students, especially from small towns and underprivileged backgrounds, struggle to make informed decisions due to limited awareness, absence of mentorship, and reliance on outdated or generic career tests. This often results in wrong career choices, unemployment, and frustration.

Our platform addresses these gaps by providing psychology-based self-discovery tools, personalized career roadmaps, and mentorship from real industry experts. By introducing networking features, we also reduce the sense of isolation among students, allowing them to learn and grow with peers who share similar interests.

In the future, with AR/VR-based immersive experiences, students will gain practical career exposure regardless of their geographical or financial limitations. By bridging the gap between talent and opportunity, M2Guide is addressing challenges of misguided career choices, unequal access, and unemployment, ensuring that every student can dream with clarity and pursue with confidence.
data.We develop partnerships with schools, NG:
M2Guide is deeply rooted in community engagement and believes in creating impact beyond technology. We actively collaborate with schools, colleges, and local organizations to introduce career awareness programs and workshops. Our initiative also partners with volunteer mentors and educators from diverse fields, giving students access to real-life experiences and guidance.

Through student networking features, M2Guide fosters peer-to-peer learning, enabling learners from the same city to share knowledge, collaborate, and grow together. We also involve parents and teachers, ensuring they play an active role in shaping a student's journey.

By building a community-driven ecosystem, M2Guide empowers youth with career clarity while strengthening collective responsibility towards education, guidance, and employment.
data.We developed a flexible, digital, and re:
At M2Guide, resilience and adaptability are at the core of our journey. As a startup working in the education and career guidance sector, we have faced challenges ranging from limited resources to evolving student needs. Each challenge has been an opportunity to learn, innovate, and grow. For instance, instead of relying on expensive and traditional aptitude tests, we adapted by creating psychological assignments†”a low-cost, highly impactful digital tool that resonates with today's students.

During uncertain times, such as post-pandemic recovery, we embraced digital-first strategies, ensuring that our platform is accessible online and scalable across geographies. By prioritizing mobile accessibility, we ensured that even students from small towns with limited resources can benefit from career guidance.

Our adaptability is also reflected in the way we continuously integrate feedback from users, mentors, and institutions to improve features. Moving forward, we are focusing on digital transformation strategies such as AR/VR integration, data-driven insights, and AI-enabled personalization to keep pace with global innovations in education technology.

Economic fluctuations are addressed by keeping our model lean, leveraging collaborations, and creating sustainable revenue streams through mentorship and partnerships. This ability to pivot quickly, embrace technology, and remain community-focused ensures that M2Guide thrives even in difficult circumstances.

The journey of M2Guide demonstrates resilience and adaptability. Starting with limited resources, we built a digital-first, mobile-friendly platform to reach students even in small towns. We operate an Innovation Impact Hub at Islamic State University, providing dedicated physical space for community engagement and collaboration. Additionally, we contribute through judging entrepreneurship competitions, offering scholarships, supporting youth innovation projects including environmentally friendly automotive technology development, and providing ongoing mentorship to emerging entrepreneurs and digital talent across Southeast Asia and beyond.
data.We developed a flexible, digital, and re: Recognizing that 85% of jobs anticipated for 2030 do not currently exist, MAXY Academy demonstrates adaptability through continuous curriculum evolution aligned with emerging industry demands and technological advancement worldwide. Our AI-powered learning pathways, virtual mentorship systems, and intelligent job matching capabilities enable rapid adaptation to global market changes and evolving skill requirements across developing economies. We have strategically expanded our network from 90 to 300+ university partners with a target of 1,000 by 2026, while diversifying program offerings from intensive bootcamps to comprehensive professional certification programs that meet international standards. Our global expansion strategy across emerging markets and active participation in international programs such as the Korea-ASEAN Digital Academy demonstrate institutional resilience and cross-border market adaptability. Despite challenging global EdTech market conditions affecting developing nations, we maintain financial stability with projected substantial revenue growth through diversified revenue streams and strategic international partnership development.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
MAXY Academy deserves this award for its AI-driven EdTech platform that has revolutionized digital skills training in emerging markets since 2021. Our unique ecosystem combines AI-powered personalized learning, virtual mentors, and intelligent talent matching with AWS and CompTIA certifications.

We've achieved remarkable growth with 300+ university partnerships, 100+ industry collaborations, and 80-97% graduate placement rates globally. Our adaptive curriculum continuously evolves to meet changing industry demands through Digital Career Bootcamps and Applied AI training.

Beyond traditional education, we create transformative social impact by empowering marginalized communities†”including female inmates†”with digital marketing, entrepreneurship, and AI skills. NEMA AI brings a breakthrough approach to dementia screening by eliminating the need for expensive, time-intensive MRI or PET scans. Instead, our solution uses a simple 10†“15 minute EEG recording combined with proprietary AI algorithms to detect early signs of cognitive decline. This makes screening highly cost-effective, non-invasive, and efficient, opening access for millions who cannot afford or access advanced imaging facilities.

What sets NEMA AI apart is its ability to deliver objective, data-driven dementia risk insights at a fraction of the cost and time compared to traditional methods. The technology is under clinical validation with AIIMS, positioning it for ICMR certification and CDSCO clearance in India, while also aligning with FDA-level standards for international scalability.

By blending neuroscience, AI, and accessibility, NEMA AI redefines how dementia is detected and managed†”making early screening practical for both urban hospitals and rural clinics.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: The vision: to restore balance to the earth with the use of technology. NetZero is a climate solutions company scaling high-integrity, nature-based carbon removal through smart afforestation and ecosystem restoration. Our mission is to accelerate climate resilience by deploying data-driven, verifiable tree-planting programs in climate-stressed regions across the globe. Using our proprietary technology, we manage to map and track trees by introducing the smart trees approch. Unlike traditional tree-planting models, netzero's system ensures continuous data collection and survivability tracking, avoiding resource waste and enabling high-integrity carbon sequestration. Through these innovations, netzero helps regions build natural defenses against climate change.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
NetZero.sa Innovation & Uniqueness

At NetZero.sa, we have developed a suite of interconnected technologies that together bring unprecedented transparency, accuracy, and engagement to climate action. Each of our innovations serves a distinct purpose, but when integrated, they create a powerful ecosystem that works seamlessly across B2B, B2C, and B2B2C models.

1. Tree Map
Tree Map is our online platform where every tree is digitally represented in its exact location. By clicking on a tree, companies and individuals can access detailed data such as photos, species, size, health, and the amount of carbon it has stored. This level of visibility empowers businesses to verify their environmental commitments with clarity and precision.

2. Tree Log
Tree Log ensures transparency at the ground level. When a tree is planted, the system captures a photo, logs the exact GPS location, and immediately feeds this information into Tree Map. This guarantees that every single tree is authenticated, traceable, and visible in the digital ecosystem.

3. Tree Wallet
Tree Wallet personalizes climate action for individuals. It provides a digital space where people can connect with their trees, track their impact, gift them to others, and even link them to life events like completing a marathon, celebrating a child's birth, or choosing sustainable transport. By making trees part of people's personal journeys, Tree Wallet turns environmental action into something meaningful and memorable.

Integrated Ecosystem: From Ground to Global
What makes NetZero.sa unique is how these technologies integrate into one another. Together, they create a multi-layered verification system: every tree is individually logged on the ground, analyzed with AI for species, size, health, and growth, and validated at scale using satellite monitoring for canopy and carbon storage. This layered approach ensures that our data is accurate, transparent, and proofed through multiple channels.


NetZero.sa Business Model

1. Creating a New Market: Smart Trees Economy
NetZero.sa is pioneering the †œsmart trees† economy in Saudi Arabia, starting from the Eastern Region and expanding nationwide. We are positioning ourselves as the leader in turning trees into measurable assets that drive both environmental and economic value.

2. Land Acquisition & Strategic Partnerships
Our model is built on securing ideal land solutions through partnerships with:

Government entities (municipalities, universities, airports, highways, parks)

Semi-government organizations

NGOs

NetZero.sa has become a pioneer in land acquisition, gaining access not only to large-scale land but also to essential resources such as water and other inputs required for sustainable tree planting. We work closely with landowners on soil testing and species selection to ensure successful plantation.

3. One-Stop Shop for Environmental Solutions
With land resources secured, NetZero.sa offers an integrated platform for:

Ecosystem restoration

Tree plantation at scale

Environmental sustainability projects

CSR and ESG activities

Sustainability and ESG reporting

This makes us the go-to partner for companies and organizations seeking credible, measurable, and impactful green initiatives.

4. Technology-Driven Competitive Advantage
NetZero.sa successfully markets its locally developed technologies to the private sector, enabling funding and large-scale deployment of tree planting initiatives. Our advantage lies in:

Innovative AI and IoT technologies for monitoring trees

Nationwide land access for rapid scaling

Integration of B2B, B2C, and B2B2C models

Through this approach, NetZero.sa has planted over 1 million trees in record time.

5. Carbon Credits Leadership
NetZero.sa is the first local and regional company to advance carbon credit projects. Our technologies are scientifically validated and aligned with international carbon accreditation bodies.

We are not only the first company to generate carbon credits from trees in Saudi Arabia but also the first to unlock soil-based carbon credits through biochar.

Why This Model is Unique

Exclusive land partnerships across Saudi Arabia

Locally developed, science-backed technologies

Integrated environmental solutions (from planting to ESG reporting)

First mover in carbon credit generation (trees + soil)

Scalable impact: over 1 million trees planted already
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev:
Job Creation & Economic Impact

At NetZero.sa, our business model not only advances environmental sustainability but also drives significant job creation at both national and international levels.

1. Empowering Local Nurseries
NetZero.sa exclusively sources trees from local nurseries for all our projects across Saudi Arabia. By doing so, we strengthen local supply chains and directly support the growth of small and medium enterprises in the sector. To date, this has resulted in the creation of over 250 new jobs within partner nurseries.

2. Direct Employment at NetZero.sa
We have already built a strong team of 48 employees and are committed to expanding our workforce. By the first quarter of 2026, we aim to employ 100 Saudi talents, contributing to national workforce development and aligning with Saudi Arabia's vision for local talent empowerment.

3. International Job Creation
Our Tree Log technology is expanding globally, with multiple projects already commissioned in regional and international markets. As adoption grows, these projects will generate new employment opportunities internationally, extending NetZero.sa's positive economic impact beyond Saudi Arabia.
data.We operate in the fight against digital:
Challenges & NetZero.sa's Innovative Solutions

1. Environmental Challenges
Saudi Arabia is characterized by vast desert lands, extreme heat, water scarcity, and harsh climatic conditions. These factors make large-scale plantation and sustaining green coverage extremely difficult. Traditional methods often fail to ensure survival rates of trees under such tough circumstances.

To overcome these barriers, NetZero.sa has introduced cutting-edge AI technologies that analyze:

Soil composition and health

Underground water availability

Air speed and microclimate conditions

This enables rapid, data-driven decisions about where, how, and what type of trees to plant. Our guiding principle is clear: †œWe cannot force a tree into a broken system.†

To achieve this, we developed RMDY, an AI-powered tool designed to understand land and ecosystems, and recommend the most effective surgical interventions for successful, sustainable planting.

2. Social Challenges
Beyond environmental difficulties, communities and private sector partners often raise important questions:

Where exactly are the trees planted?

Who is taking care of them?

How many have survived?

Who is monitoring and counting them?

These questions highlight the lack of transparency in traditional plantation models.

3. NetZero.sa's Transparency Solutions
After years of research, we addressed these social challenges by introducing Tree Map and Tree Wallet:

Tree Map brings full transparency by showing every tree in its exact location, along with data on its health, species, and carbon storage.

Tree Wallet connects individuals and communities to their trees, giving them ownership and visibility into their impact.

Together, these technologies bring accuracy, accountability, and transparency to nature-based solutions, while also fostering a personal relationship between people and their trees.
data.We develop partnerships with schools, NG:
Youth Empowerment & Awareness

At NetZero.sa, we place youth at the center of our mission. Our technologies and innovations have inspired many young people across Saudi Arabia†”from local universities to nationwide initiatives†”to actively engage in climate action and environmental sustainability.

1. Empowering Youth through Technology
By introducing tools like Tree Log and Tree Wallet, we enable university students and young professionals to directly participate in tree planting, monitoring, and sustainability projects. These technologies give youth hands-on experience in applying digital solutions to environmental challenges.

2. Building Awareness & Engagement
NetZero.sa goes beyond internal capacity building. We actively:

Host and participate in national and international conferences to raise awareness on climate solutions.

Conduct awareness activities in universities, encouraging students to take part in plantation programs.

Encourage youth participation in national sustainability competitions, aligning with the goals of Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030.

3. Youth-Driven Team
Our commitment is reflected in our own workforce†”the entire NetZero.sa team consists of young professionals, all graduates from local universities. This ensures that our solutions are not only innovative but also deeply rooted in the aspirations of Saudi Arabia's next generation of leaders.
data.We developed a flexible, digital, and re:
Agile and Resilient Business Model

At NetZero.sa, we have developed an agile and flexible business model designed to adapt and thrive even during times of economic uncertainty. For example, during the COVID-19 pandemic, NetZero successfully sustained operations through a lean approach, proving the resilience of our strategy.

1. Global Scalability
Our solutions are tailored not only to the Saudi environment but also adaptable to regional and international markets. Today, NetZero is already operating in:

Bahrain, Egypt, Indonesia, Morocco, and Brazil

With expansion into Malaysia planned for the end of this quarter

This global presence demonstrates our ability to scale and operate across diverse ecosystems.

2. Diversified Partnerships
NetZero's revenue model is not solely dependent on the private sector. We are now working directly with government ministries as well as private organizations, creating a strong dual market base.

3. Expanding Incentives Across Sectors
We actively design incentives for non†“oil and gas sectors, including:

Tourism

Healthcare

Transportation

Manufacturing

And other industries

This approach encourages these sectors to participate in tree planting and contribute to both the Saudi Green Initiative and the Middle East Green Initiative.

4. Multiple Revenue Streams
By combining government partnerships, private sector engagement, and international operations, NetZero.sa ensures multiple sustainable revenue streams across regions and industries.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh: At netzero, we believe climate action must do more than restore nature, it must improve lives, empower communities, and inspire hope, and this is what we deliver. From planting micro forests in urban areas improving air quality and increasing bioversity, to engaging children in hospitals and farmers in Brazil, we have shown that environmental solutions can change human behavior and contribute towards climate action. To date, we have planted over 1.5 smart million trees, covering 1,350 hectares, removing 14.2 million kg of COâ‚‚ and 964,900 kg of air pollutants, while forging partnerships with 60+ governments and private entities both in Saudi Arabia and globally. Yet our true achievement lies in how we connect restoration with people's daily lives. In Madinah, trees planted along hospitals and pilgrimage routes now shade millions of visitors, protecting them from extreme heat during their visit to the Holy Sites. In a pediatric dialysis unit, young patients planted trees themselves, finding healing and purpose in nature. Along coastlines, our mangrove projects restore fisheries, sequester higher amounts of carbon, improve water quality, and build resilience for vulnerable communities. We have demonstrated resilience and adaptability by operating across Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Egypt, and Brazil, tailoring solutions to vastly different ecosystems and cultural contexts. data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: Next Big Innovation Labs (NBIL) is not just another bioprinting company; we are at the forefront of innovation with multiple patents filed in the field of bioprinting. data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: Puba is a bioindustry producing inputs for cosmetics and agribusiness that combines technology, innovation, and sustainability. Our mission is to transform biodiversity into high-value-added solutions, using cutting-edge biotechnological processes while respecting the environment. All of our raw materials are purchased from small producers in the Caatinga and Cerrado regions, strengthening local communities and promoting circular economy practices. We use green chemistry, biotecnology an nanotechnology to produce plant extracts.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
The Puba's innovation lies in PlantProtek, a breakthrough nanophotoprotector for agriculture. Unlike conventional solutions such as kaolin-based protectors, PlantProtek is transparent, biodegradable, and selective in UV absorption. It blocks harmful UVB rays that cause plant burns and stress while allowing UVA rays, essential for fruit ripening and sugar accumulation, to pass through. This selective mechanism not only prevents sunburn but also enhances fruit quality and accelerates maturation.

Its uniqueness comes from combining nanotechnology with sustainability: the nanocomposites are produced from plants. Competitors rely on mineral-based products that leave visible residues, require frequent application, and compromise fruit appearance. PlantProtek, instead, ensures clean application, superior efficiency, lower cost, and added value for farmers, positioning Puba at the forefront of sustainable agricultural innovation.
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev: Puba contributes to job creation by integrating smallholder farmers into its value chain, purchasing raw materials from them and generating local demand for agro-industrial residues. The company also creates qualified jobs in biotechnology, agronomy, and production, while strengthening regional cooperatives and agribusiness partners. By improving farmers' productivity and income through nanophotoprotection, Puba stimulates local consumption and economic development, creating a multiplier effect similar to programs like Bolsa Família, where increased family income drives broader community growth.
data.We operate in the fight against digital: Puba addresses environmental, social, and economic challenges simultaneously. Environmentally, it reduces the use of polluting inputs such as kaolin by offering a biodegradable, selective nanophotoprotector that improves plant resilience to climate change. Socially, it empowers farmers with access to innovative bio-inputs and technical training, ensuring inclusion of small-scale producers. Economically, it mitigates losses from sunburned fruits, increases agricultural income, and contributes to food security in regions highly exposed to UV radiation and climate instability.
data.We develop partnerships with schools, NG: Community is at the heart of Puba's strategy. The company directly involves family farmers by sourcing raw materials from the Caatinga and Cerrado, valuing biodiversity and generating fair income. It conducts workshops and training sessions in partnership with FAEB and SENAR, building technical capacity for sustainable practices. Puba also mentors young scientists and entrepreneurs, particularly women, inspiring them to see science as a pathway for innovation and socio-environmental impact. By strengthening local production chains, Puba uplifts communities and fosters a culture of sustainable entrepreneurship.
data.We developed a flexible, digital, and re: Puba has demonstrated resilience by thriving in a highly regulated and resource-constrained environment. The startup adapted advanced nanotechnology to agriculture, ensuring affordable and scalable solutions for farmers. During crises such as climate change impacts or economic downturns, its innovation helps producers reduce losses, secure food production, and maintain income stability. The company also embraces digital transformation through R&D collaborations and precision agriculture approaches, ensuring adaptability to future challenges. Its strong network of academic, industrial, and community partners ensures long-term sustainability and rapid response to emerging needs.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh: Puba deserves recognition for transforming science into a business model that merges nanotechnology, sustainability, and social impact. Our flagship innovation, PlantProtek, is a nanophotoprotector that shields plants from harmful UV radiation while maintaining fruit quality and accelerating maturation. Unlike traditional inputs such as kaolin, our solution is transparent, biodegradable, and derived from agro-industrial residues and native species, ensuring both environmental and economic sustainability. This unique value proposition positions Puba at the frontier of green innovation in agriculture, delivering high efficiency while promoting circular economy practices. Our journey reflects resilience and adaptability. Founded in the Brazilian semi-arid region, where resources are scarce and climate challenges are severe, we have advanced despite limited access to funding and infrastructure. By leveraging partnerships with universities, cooperatives, and farmers, we transformed constraints into opportunities. Each challenge†”be it regulatory hurdles, scaling laboratory processes, or market adoption†”was addressed with creativity and persistence, consolidating a startup capable of thriving in an adverse environment while keeping innovation accessible to smallholders. The social impact of Puba is embedded in its DNA. We generate income for family farmers by sourcing raw materials and by reducing crop losses caused by excessive sun exposure, directly improving livelihoods. We promote inclusion by training producers and mentoring young scientists, especially women, to engage in sustainable entrepreneurship. By turning local biodiversity and residues into high-value agricultural inputs, Puba strengthens communities, enhances food security, and fosters resilience against climate change. We believe recognition will amplify our mission to prove that innovation born in the Brazil.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari:
Pumpkn is digital lender to SMEs overlooked by traditional lenders operating in the agri and food value chain. Founded in 2023, the company operates fully digitally, leveraging automated affordability assessments, machine learning credit scoring, and real-time portfolio monitoring. 
Pumpkn's Funding Ladder model allows borrowers to progress from smaller, short-tenor loans to larger, lower-cost facilities as repayment performance is demonstrated. This approach builds financial histories for borrowers while maintaining controlled credit exposure.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact: The most important part of our lending solution is our †œFunding Ladder†, which is designed to support business as they grow. SMEs start with smaller loans; we learn about their repayment behaviour & improve our ability to forecast their affordability. Over time we develop a deeper understanding of their credit profile. Importantly, larger tickets are unlocked only when proven on smaller tickets. This structured loan scaling algorithm, our †œFunding Ladder†, is our USP.

data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
Pumpkn deserves recognition as a transformative force in South Africa's agri-financing landscape. By pioneering its proprietary †œFunding Ladder† model, Pumpkn provides critically needed, scalable financing to SMEs that are routinely overlooked by traditional banks due to limited financial records or collateral. Since its inception, Pumpkn has deployed over R12 million across 230 loans, demonstrating both strong market demand and disciplined repayment behaviour. Its innovative approach uniquely balances risk management with growth, progressively enabling borrowers to access larger facilities as they build credit histories.
Pumpkn's resilience and adaptability are evident in its track record. Operating with a lean balance sheet, the company has achieved strong gross yields, maintained non-performing loans around 10%, and iteratively refined its credit processes to accommodate early-stage borrowers while mitigating default risk. These outcomes reflect Pumpkn's ability to navigate economic volatility, external shocks, and the inherent challenges of lending to credit-file-thin SMEs.
Beyond early signs of commercial potential, Pumpkn drives substantial social impact. Approximately 75% of its borrowers are black-owned and nearly half are women-led, strengthening financial inclusion, creating jobs, and supporting South Africa's food security. The platform's digital-first, data-driven approach ensures accessibility for rural and under-served communities, fostering inclusivity and empowering entrepreneurs who would otherwise remain excluded from formal finance.
In sum, Pumpkn exemplifies innovation, resilience, and social responsibility. Its achievements demonstrate that commercial success and societal impact can be mutually reinforcing, making it a compelling candidate for recognition.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: Rayush Naturals is a circular economy startup dedicated to eliminating microplastics from daily life †” from our homes to our food systems. We replace synthetic, non-functional plastic home textiles like blinds and curtains with innovative, fragrant eco-textiles crafted from the waste of aromatic crops. Our patented Aroma-Lock Technology ensures long-lasting natural fragrance while providing temperature regulation and double insulation. Beyond homes, our unique buyback and reprocessing model transforms used products into biodegradable mulch films for agriculture. This dual-impact innovation creates sustainable value, reduces plastic pollution, and supports rural livelihoods, making us a true force for green transformation.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact: Our innovation lies in creating functional home textiles using a patented technology that transforms rough vetiver roots and agricultural waste into smooth, durable, and naturally aromatic yarn. This yarn is woven into beautiful, fragrant, and temperature-regulating home textiles such as blinds, rugs, and carpets. The true differentiator is our complete circularity model †” once products reach their end-of-life, we buy them back and reprocess them into biodegradable mulch films for agriculture. This not only replaces microplastic-laden products but also delivers environmental, functional, and social impact from roots to homes to farms.
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev: Rayush Naturals creates employment at multiple stages of its value chain. By sourcing and processing vetiver roots and agricultural waste, we provide income opportunities to farmers for crop by-products that would otherwise go unused. Our weaving and textile production model is artisan-driven, generating dignified jobs for local women and rural communities through skill training and fair wages. Further, the buyback and reprocessing of used textiles into biodegradable mulch films fosters micro-enterprise opportunities in waste collection, processing, and green manufacturing. This integrated approach strengthens local circular economies, reduces dependence on imports, and contributes to sustainable regional economic growth.
data.We operate in the fight against digital:
Rayush Naturals directly tackles three pressing social challenges:
Microplastic Pollution in Daily Life †“ Replacing synthetic home textiles and plastic mulch films with natural, biodegradable alternatives to safeguard health, food, and soil.
Rural Livelihood Insecurity †“ Creating dignified employment for artisans, women, and farmers by turning agricultural waste into value-added products.
Climate & Land Degradation †“ Promoting circular economy practices that reduce plastic waste, restore soil health, and cut carbon footprints.
Through this integrated model, we address environmental health, rural livelihoods, and sustainable consumption in one solution.
data.We develop partnerships with schools, NG: Rayush Naturals works hand-in-hand with local communities to build an inclusive circular economy. We source agricultural by-products directly from smallholder farmers, creating a new income stream from what was once waste. By training and employing women and rural artisans in weaving, processing, and quality control, we provide dignified livelihoods and skill development. Our buyback and reprocessing model engages local collection networks, fostering micro-enterprise opportunities. Beyond income, we promote community pride in eco-innovation, enabling villages to become active stakeholders in environmental restoration while strengthening social equity and resilience.

By transforming agri-waste into value-added textiles and mulch films, we reduce dependency on scarce raw materials while ensuring flexibility in sourcing. This integrated approach makes our enterprise resilient to global disruptions and adaptable to evolving sustainability standards.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
At Rayush Naturals, we are driven by a vision to eliminate microplastics from daily life while creating sustainable livelihoods and restoring ecosystems. Our startup deserves recognition for pioneering a complete circular economy model that transforms vetiver roots and agricultural waste into fragrant, functional home textiles and later upcycles them into biodegradable mulch films for agriculture. This unique value proposition†”where one product seamlessly transitions into another†”sets us apart globally.

Our journey has been one of resilience and adaptability. From working with unconventional raw materials to developing our patented Aroma-Lock technology, we have consistently innovated despite limited resources. Challenges such as establishing artisan supply chains and scaling production were turned into opportunities by building strong community partnerships and modular production models, proving our ability to adapt in dynamic environments.

The social impact of Rayush Naturals is at the heart of our mission. We empower farmers by sourcing agri-waste, create fair-wage jobs for rural women and artisans, and reduce plastic pollution that affects communities worldwide. By aligning environmental health with economic opportunity, we showcase creativity in addressing interconnected societal needs.

Recognition of our work would not only celebrate our achievements†”such as winning the TiE Women Pitch, StartUp India Award, and international recognition at MIT Solve and Domotex Germany†”but also amplify our ability to scale impact. With innovation, resilience, and inclusivity as our foundation, Rayush Naturals is committed to building a greener, fairer future.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: Relife is a sustainability-driven startup transforming waste into value by producing eco-friendly seed-tipped pencils made from recycled paper. Unlike traditional wooden pencils, our products reduce deforestation, cut paper waste, and enable reforestation, as each pencil can be planted to grow into a tree. To date, Relife has sold over 25,000 pencils, saved 512 trees, and planted 25,000 trees, while creating green jobs for women and youth. Recognized through multiple national awards and media features, Relife stands at the intersection of climate action, education, and social impact, committed to building a greener, more sustainable future.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
Relife's innovation lies in its circular economy model that transforms waste paper into eco-friendly seed-tipped pencils. Our unique production process replaces wood with recycled paper, reducing deforestation and diverting waste from landfills. Each pencil carries a seed capsule at its tip, enabling users to plant it after use, turning everyday stationery into a tool for reforestation.

Beyond product innovation, our business model integrates fintech partnerships with banking apps, where customers earn †œGreen Points† for transactions that can be redeemed for Relife products. This merges sustainable consumption with digital engagement, making eco-friendly practices rewarding and accessible.

Unlike traditional stationery companies, Relife combines green manufacturing, climate education, and digital incentives. This multidimensional approach sets us apart by delivering measurable environmental and social impact, while also offering affordability, scalability, and a strong first-mover advantage in Pakistan's eco-stationery sector.
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev: Relife contributes to local economic development by creating green jobs across recycling, production, and distribution. Our model employs women and youth in the production of eco-friendly pencils, providing them with stable income and skills training. As we scale with machinery, we aim to create dozens of additional jobs in operations, logistics, and sales. By turning waste into value, we stimulate micro-economies around paper collection and sustainable product manufacturing, fostering inclusive economic growth.
data.We operate in the fight against digital: Relife tackles multiple social challenges: environmental degradation, unemployment, and lack of awareness. By replacing wooden pencils with recycled paper pencils, we directly address deforestation and waste mismanagement. Our inclusive employment model empowers women and youth with income opportunities. At the same time, through our products and plantation drives, we promote climate education among students and communities, encouraging behavioral change toward sustainability.
data.We develop partnerships with schools, NG: Community is at the heart of Relife. We conduct awareness campaigns and recycling drives in schools and universities, encouraging students to collect paper waste and engage in tree-planting activities. We empower youth by involving them in sustainability projects and mentorship programs, inspiring them to become climate leaders. Relife's approach ensures that local communities not only benefit from green jobs but also become active participants in building a sustainable future.
data.We developed a flexible, digital, and re: Relife has demonstrated resilience by thriving despite challenges such as limited resources, high production costs, and market price sensitivity. We adapt by innovating†”shifting from manual to semi-automated processes, introducing fintech-linked reward models, and diversifying our partnerships with schools, corporates, and NGOs. Our ability to pivot strategies, embrace technology, and remain committed to impact ensures that Relife can withstand obstacles while continuing to grow sustainably.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
Relife deserves recognition because it represents how a simple idea can create powerful change. By producing eco-friendly seed-tipped pencils made from recycled paper, Relife addresses deforestation, waste management, and climate education in one solution. Unlike traditional pencils, ours give a second life to waste and a future to the environment†”every pencil has the power to grow into a tree. This unique value proposition has gained recognition through national awards, features on leading media outlets, and adoption by schools, corporates, and communities.

Our journey has not been without challenges. Manual production made scaling difficult, while price sensitivity in the market created barriers against cheaper wooden pencils. Yet, we showed resilience by streamlining operations, engaging in recycling drives, and innovating with fintech partnerships to integrate †œGreen Points† into banking apps†”rewarding users for sustainable actions. This adaptability allowed us to expand despite constraints, reaching thousands of users and building trust in our brand.

The social impact of Relife extends beyond climate action. To date, we have sold over 25,000 pencils, saved 512 trees, planted 25,000 trees, and created jobs for women and youth in production and recycling. Our model is inclusive, providing green employment, while also inspiring students and communities to actively participate in sustainability through awareness campaigns and plantation drives.

Relife is not just a startup†”it is a movement that combines innovation, resilience, and social impact. With recognition, we can scale further and empower even more communities to take part in building a greener future.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari:
Mission: Use deep tech to democratize advanced diabetes treatment in India and other low / middle income countries, through cutting-edge and affordable medical devices
Solution: Our innovation is a Made-in-India Insulin Pump coupled with a Continuous Glucose Monitor, engineered for affordability, usability in local conditions, and scalability to LMICs. This addresses a
massive public health gap while reducing hospitalizations, HbA1c, insulin dosages.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
Our Insulin Infusion Pump will be an oval shaped tubeless patch pump, 60 mm x 40 mm x 15 mm, radically different from the incumbent in terms of price, usability and form factor. It will be priced at 1/10th of the incumbent, thereby making it accessible to over 35 mn people. Moreover, it is being developed to overcome all the problems associated (listed below) with the incumbent -
1. Prohibitively expensive 
2. Not covered under insurance 
3. Obstructs activity
4. Parents are wary of kids damaging it
5. Social stigma
6. Bulky
7. Does not suit Indian clothing
8. Very complex to use
9. Does not support hot and humid weather
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev:
Our startup contributes to both job creation and local economic development by building India's first affordable, Made-in-India insulin infusion pump and glucose monitoring ecosystem. Today, India imports over 75% of advanced medical devices, creating dependency and limiting affordability. By indigenizing design, engineering, and manufacturing, we are reversing this trend and creating a domestic value chain.

Job creation:

- Skilled R&D and engineering roles in electronics, software, and biomedical design.
- Manufacturing and assembly jobs through partnerships with Indian suppliers and MSMEs.
- Field workforce for distribution, training, and servicing across Tier 2/3 cities.
- Data and digital health jobs via our ICT-enabled platform, cloud analytics, and app development.

Economic development:
- Reduces costly imports, retaining capital within India.
- Expands access to advanced diabetes care for millions, reducing hospitalization and boosting productivity.
- Stimulates the medtech startup ecosystem by creating a model for frugal, world-class healthcare innovation.
- By scaling production to serve India and other LMICs, we aim to generate hundreds of direct jobs and thousands of indirect jobs while positioning India as a global hub for affordable diabetes technology.
data.We operate in the fight against digital:
Our startup addresses critical social challenges by making advanced diabetes care affordable, inclusive, and stigma-free. Diabetes disproportionately affects low- and middle-income populations, yet less than 1% of Indian patients access insulin pump therapy due to high cost, lack of local design, and social barriers.

Inclusion: We design for underserved groups†”youth with Type 1 diabetes, rural populations, and women often excluded from advanced care†”by ensuring affordability, insurance readiness, and intuitive usability in local conditions.

Social stigma: Conventional box-shaped, tubed pumps with clip-ons make patients feel visibly †œdifferent,† fueling embarrassment and reduced adoption. Our discreet, patch-shaped, tubeless pump is hidden under clothing, restoring dignity and empowering patients to live confidently without social judgment.

Social welfare: By improving adherence, our device reduces hospitalizations, premature deaths, and economic strain on families, while boosting productivity.

Environmental responsibility: Local manufacturing cuts import-linked carbon emissions; modular design minimizes e-waste; and we are exploring recyclable materials for consumables.

In sum, our innovation goes beyond technology†”it delivers an inclusive, environmentally responsible, and socially empowering healthcare solution for millions in India and other LMICs.
data.We develop partnerships with schools, NG:
Our startup's mission extends beyond technology†”we actively contribute to community upliftment and youth empowerment. Diabetes disproportionately affects young people in India, particularly those with Type 1, who face daily challenges of painful injections, stigma, and limited access to advanced care. By introducing an affordable, discreet patch pump, we empower this generation to live healthier, more confident lives, pursue education and careers without interruption, and participate fully in society.

We are building patient support networks in collaboration with Type 1 diabetes communities, parents' groups, and NGOs, fostering awareness, education, and peer-to-peer learning. This not only uplifts patients but also reduces social isolation and mental health burdens.

On the mentorship front, as an early-stage medtech company incubated at Venture Center Pune, we actively engage with student innovators, engineering graduates, and young entrepreneurs, sharing our journey of medical device development, regulatory navigation, and frugal innovation. This ecosystem approach creates role models, inspires youth to build impactful solutions, and strengthens India's innovation culture.

In sum, our work uplifts communities through better health, empowers youth through confidence and opportunity, and mentors the next generation to carry forward the vision of inclusive, accessible healthcare innovation.
data.We developed a flexible, digital, and re:
Our journey has been defined by resilience in the face of adversity. Developing a Class C medical device in India†”where infrastructure, regulations, and capital access are challenging†”demanded adaptability at every step.

Economic recovery strategies: We follow a frugal innovation model†”designing for affordability without compromising safety. By modularizing hardware, co-locating with incubator facilities, and leveraging grant funding before equity, we ensure capital efficiency. Our model generates recurring revenues from consumables, providing resilience even during economic downturns.

Digital transformation: ICT is core to our insulin pump, integrating mobile connectivity, cloud monitoring, and data analytics. This enhances patient care while future-proofing the business through telehealth and AI-driven personalization. Internally, we digitize processes†”remote design collaboration, virtual training, and cloud-based regulatory documentation†”ensuring continuity even during crises like COVID-19.

Leadership resilience: Our Co-founder & CEO, Vardhan Phadnis, is a 2x entrepreneur with †œvictory scars† from his first startup. His experience navigating setbacks and recoveries equips us with the mindset and agility to thrive under pressure.

These strategies, coupled with resilient leadership, enable us not just to survive but to grow†”delivering life-saving technology, creating local jobs, and strengthening India's medtech ecosystem in a sustainable, future-ready way.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
From India's first insulin pump in the 1990s to today's next-generation, discreet patch pump, our team is rewriting the future of diabetes care for India and the world.

Our startup deserves recognition because we are addressing one of India's most urgent health challenges: diabetes. With over 150 million patients, including millions with Type 1 at high risk, advanced insulin pump therapy remains out of reach due to cost, imports, and stigma. We are building the first Made-in-India, tubeless, patch-shape insulin pump with digital connectivity†”affordable, discreet, and designed for local conditions.

Our resilience is demonstrated in overcoming early-stage barriers: innovating a novel engineering mechanism, filing a patent for it, comprehending stringent regulations and preparing for clinical validation in resource-limited settings. Co-founder Vardhan Phadnis, a 2x entrepreneur with †œvictory scars,† and Co-founder Ajay Bhagwat, pioneer of India's first insulin pump, combine entrepreneurial grit with domain leadership.

Our innovation reduces hospitalizations, increases life expectancy, creates skilled jobs, and strengthens India's medtech ecosystem. By selecting us, you back a movement to democratize diabetes care globally.

data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
Reslocate deserves recognition because it is transforming the way young people in Africa prepare for their futures. In many schools, career guidance is limited, outdated, or unavailable, leaving learners underprepared for the world of work. Reslocate bridges this gap through an AI-powered platform that automates APS scores, matches learners to careers, and integrates labour market insights into one accessible solution. The social impact of Reslocate is at the heart of our mission. We are democratising access to quality career guidance, empowering learners from both urban and rural communities to make informed decisions about their futures. By aligning education choices with labour market demand, we reduce unemployment, close skills gaps, and uplift communities. Our model fosters inclusion by ensuring that every learner†”regardless of background†”has access to the same opportunities and insights.

Reslocate is more than a startup; it is a movement to reimagine education-to-employment pathways and unlock Africa's youth potential.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: Ria Green is dedicated to transforming electronic and photovoltaic waste into sustainable opportunities for both the planet and society. Anchored in green innovation, the circular and creative economy, intelligent reverse logistics, and the generation of skilled employment, the company applies science as a catalyst to strengthen the national recycling value chain and promote socio-environmental justice. More than a business, Ria Green represents a movement toward building a sustainable and technologically advanced future. Guided by its name†”Recycling, Innovation, and Green Art†”Ria Green integrates purpose, partnerships, and technology to create solutions that inspire systemic environmental transformation.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
In Brazil, there are no specialized industries offering a complete solution for the recycling of electronic waste and photovoltaic cells. The country generates approximately 2.4 million tons per year (Brazil currently ranks only behind the USA, China, and India in annual e-waste generation) and recycles on average just 3% of this volume.
To address this challenge, our solution is distinguished by a high-performance, sustainable technology for the recycling, recovery, and purification of metals using non-hazardous, non-toxic chemical reagents, safe for both humans and the environment. This approach reduces operational costs, optimizes energy supply, and enhances efficiency and safety in processing electronic waste and photovoltaic cells. Additionally, during recycling stages, electricity is generated through the integration of hydrogen fuel cells. Digital technologies†”including artificial intelligence (computer vision and neural networks), blockchain, IoT, virtual reality, and cyber-physical systems†”are embedded in the recycling process, enabling high-yield recovery and purification of chemical elements extracted from electronics.
Accordingly, Ria Green offers the following solutions and products:
†¢ Reverse Logistics †“ Intelligent Collection Points (PIC) connected to Blockchain infrastructure and the Ria Green app.
†¢ Specialized Recycling †“ sustainable, clean technology for the extraction and purification of valuable materials.
†¢ Circular and Creative Economy †“ Ria Green Collection products: jewelry, handicrafts, sculptures, paintings, among others.
†¢ Reintegration of Recovered Materials †“ reintroducing valuable recycled elements into other production chains.

The company develops an integrated strategy that combines socio-environmental and sociocultural awareness with advanced technology, generating environmental, social, and economic impact. Another key social contribution is the training of waste pickers and recycling workers, advancing their professional inclusion and empowerment.

Furthermore, we act as mentors through university partnerships and internships, preparing the next generation of leaders for the circular economy. Our goal is not only to recycle materials but also to cultivate a culture of sustainability and innovation from the ground up.
data.We developed a flexible, digital, and re: Ria Green's model is structurally resilient. data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
Ria Green deserves recognition for pioneering a tangible solution to one of the world's fastest-growing waste streams: electronic and photovoltaic waste. Our unique value proposition lies in our advanced purification technology, which recovers high-purity materials like silicon and precious metals, transforming environmental liability into economic opportunity. We have moved beyond theory to practice, having already established strategic partnerships for feedstock and validated our process, positioning ourselves at the forefront of the circular economy in Brazil.
Our resilience is proven by our ability to turn challenges into strengths. In the face of complex waste logistics, we built a decentralized network with cooperatives, creating an inclusive supply chain. Economic volatility only heightens the demand for our cost-effective, recycled alternatives to virgin materials. This adaptability is core to our model, ensuring we thrive in difficult circumstances.
Our social impact is profound and creative. We uplift communities by formally integrating waste pickers, providing training, safety equipment, and fair compensation. We empower youth through our gamified app, the "RIA Green Game," fostering environmental stewardship. Furthermore, our "E-Lixo to Art" program collaborates with artisans to create beauty from waste, demonstrating inclusivity and generating new economic avenues.
We are not just recycling; we are building a sustainable, inclusive, and resilient future. We are ready to scale our impact and believe this competition is the perfect catalyst.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: RioGen is a Brazilian startup that integrates bioinformatics, machine learning, and molecular biology to develop innovative, non-invasive diagnostic solutions for cancer. Currently in the proof-of-concept stage, our first test is a molecular urine assay for prostate cancer detection. This test analyzes the gene expression profile of prostatic cells present in urine samples and applies a proprietary prediction algorithm to assess the probability of malignancy. By providing accurate risk classification, the assay aims to reduce the number of unnecessary biopsies, support clinical decision-making, and ultimately improve patient outcomes through earlier and less invasive cancer diagnosis.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact: RioGen is developing a breakthrough molecular diagnostic platform that integrates bioinformatics, machine learning, and molecular biology to deliver non-invasive cancer tests. Our first innovation is a urine-based assay for prostate cancer that analyzes gene expression profiles of prostatic cells and applies an AI-driven prediction algorithm to assess malignancy risk. Unlike conventional approaches, our solution avoids invasive procedures, reduces unnecessary biopsies, and leverages locally validated biomarkers adapted to the genetic diversity of the Brazilian population. Our unique business model focuses on B2B licensing for hospitals and laboratories, ensuring rapid scalability, broader access, and differentiation from international competitors.
data.+1Code contributes to local economic dev: RioGen is contributing to local economic development by creating highly skilled jobs in biotechnology, bioinformatics, and data science, areas of strategic importance for Brazil's knowledge economy. Our model fosters employment not only within our core team but also through partnerships with hospitals, laboratories, and research institutions. By positioning Brazil at the forefront of precision oncology, we generate demand for qualified professionals, retain local talent, and stimulate a sustainable innovation ecosystem that multiplies opportunities for suppliers, service providers, and the broader health sector.

By reducing unnecessary biopsies and associated risks, we contribute to a better quality of life and more equitable access to advanced diagnostics. Additionally, our test is developed in collaboration with Brazilian hospitals, considering the genetic diversity of the local population, thus promoting inclusion and reducing disparities in healthcare. This approach aligns with broader goals of affordability, early detection, and public health impact.

This ability to transform constraints into opportunities highlights our adaptability and reinforces our long-term growth potential.
data.Dear Evaluators,\r\nWe are writing to sh:
RioGen is a pioneering Brazilian biotech startup dedicated to transforming cancer diagnosis through non-invasive molecular tests. Our first innovation, a urine-based assay for prostate cancer, analyzes gene expression and applies machine learning algorithms to predict malignancy risk, aiming to reduce unnecessary biopsies and improve patient outcomes.
Despite limited early-stage investment in the biotech sector and complex regulatory pathways, RioGen has demonstrated remarkable resilience. By optimizing resources, leveraging academic and clinical partnerships, and adopting digital tools for research and collaboration, we have advanced our proof-of-concept stage while building the foundations for future scalability. These achievements underscore our adaptability and ability to thrive even under constrained circumstances.
Our work directly addresses critical social and healthcare challenges. Prostate cancer is one of the most prevalent cancers among men, and current diagnostic pathways often expose patients to invasive, costly, and sometimes unnecessary procedures. By offering a non-invasive, accurate, and locally validated alternative, RioGen promotes inclusivity by considering the genetic diversity of the Brazilian population and accessibility by reducing barriers to advanced diagnostics.
Recognition of RioGen would not only highlight a creative and impactful approach to cancer care but also strengthen Brazil's role in developing science-based health innovations. Our goal is to expand to other cancers and disease areas, ensuring broader societal benefits. With creativity, resilience, and a commitment to inclusivity, RioGen is ready to shape the future of diagnostics.

data.+1Code is a Social Impact EdTech prepari: RIPPLE HEALTHCARE is committed to helping the ELDERLY prevent fall-induced hip injuries, enabling a SAFER and more INDEPENDENT lifestyle. We provide AFFORDABLE and INNOVATIVE fall-prevention solutions that REDUCE injury risks, BUILD confidence, and ADDRESS the fear of falling. By restoring the SENSE OF SAFETY and FREEDOM that elderly individuals deserve, we empower them to live with dignity. At the same time, our solutions help EASE the responsibility on CARETAKERS, strengthening a more inclusive and supportive healthcare ecosystem.
data.Mais1Code has developed a Social Impact:
Hip Pro+ is an IOT-ENABLED SMART WEARABLE BELT designed to protect the elderly from hip fractures during falls. It features a PATENTED, ULTRA-FAST (<0.5 SEC) INFLATABLE CUSHION SYSTEM that deploys pre-emptively before impact, protecting both hips. The belt integrates MOTION SENSORS AND PROPRIETARY ALGORITHMS that analyze posture 1,000 TIMES PER SECOND, enabling highly accurate detection of fall risk in real time.

Built into a LIGHTWEIGHT, COMFORTABLE, AND SLEEP-COMPATIBLE DESIGN, Hip Pro+ ensures high daily compliance compared to bulky, cartridge-based alternatives. When posture instability is detected, the belt inflates SLIM BILATERAL CUSHIONS around the hips, and once the risk subsides, the cushions automatically deflate.

The solution is AI-ENHANCED, trained on THOUSANDS OF HOURS OF REAL-WORLD MOBILITY DATA, allowing not only instant response but also PREDICTIVE FALL ANALYTICS. With sufficient use, Hip Pro+ can predict the likelihood of falls in the coming week with 90%+ ACCURACY, giving seniors and caregivers time to act preventively.

In addition, the belt is WI-FI ENABLED, allowing seamless caregiver alerts and data monitoring, strengthening both SAFETY AND PEACE OF MIND. By combining PROTECTION, PREDICTION, AND COMFORT, Hip Pro+ empowers elderly users to live with DIGNITY, INDEPENDENCE, AND REDUCED FEAR OF FALLING.

Our innovation reduces the RISK OF HIP FRACTURES, enabling elderly individuals to live with SAFETY, FREEDOM, AND INDEPENDENCE. This not only lowers the BURDEN ON CAREGIVERS but also eases the FINANCIAL STRAIN on families and the healthcare system. 

By providing an AFFORDABLE, ACCESSIBLE, AND ELDERLY-FRIENDLY solution, we reduce the FEAR OF FALLING, combat SOCIAL ISOLATION, and promote ACTIVE AGEING. Ripple Healthcare addresses the dual challenge of HEALTHCARE INEQUALITY and AGEING POPULATION VULNERABILITY, fostering a more INCLUSIVE SOCIETY.

With over 300 MILLION ELDERLY EXPERIENCING FALLS GLOBALLY each year, our ELDERLY-FIRST APPROACH ensures that innovations are shaped by DIRECT FEEDBACK from seniors and their caregivers. 

Through AWARENESS CAMPAIGNS, WORKSHOPS, AND PILOTS in senior care centers and local communities, we foster TRUST and encourage ACTIVE PARTICIPATION. This approach not only improves PRODUCT ACCEPTANCE but also nurtures a sense of BELONGING AND SAFETY.
